version_description:
[Bitcoin payment]
You can use Bitcoin to buy Life-time Luxy BLACK now. Send the text ‘Bitcoin’ to Luciana for more information.

[New Search]
We know you love exploring. So the 'Browse' is now changing into 'Search' for larger size profile pic

[Bitcoin payment]
You can use Bitcoin to buy Life-time Luxy BLACK now. Send the text ‘Bitcoin’ to Luciana for more information.

[New Search]
We know you love exploring. So the 'Browse' is now changing into 'Search' for larger size profile pic

[New Search]
We know you love exploring. So the 'Browse' is now changing into 'Search' for larger size profile pictures. Upgrade to see more.

[New Boost]
New Boost is online now! More messages, likes and visitors. Get what you want directly.<

[Bug fixes]
Bug fixes and performance improvements. Enjoy dating!

[Adding a new language]
Luxy is now also available in Russian.

[Bug fixes]

[Bug fixes]

[New Match Interface]
Brand new match card appearance. Check your crush’s profile easier.
 
[Add photo filter]
Automatically beautify your photos with our new filter.
 
[Stricter requirements for profile photos]
Stricter req

[New Search]
We know you love exploring. So the 'Browse' is now changing into 'Search' for larger size profile pictures. Upgrade to see more.

[New Boost]
New Boost is online now! More messages, likes and visitors. Get what you want directly.<

新滑卡片场景
我们提供了全新滑卡片场景，操作体验更流畅，资料展示更直观。
 
新增滤镜
新增滤镜功能，自动美化你的照片。

对头像要求更严格
更加严格、明确的头像要求，提升Luxy社区质量，让你体验享受高端社交。

[New Match Interface]
Brand new match card appearance. Check your crush’s profile easier.
 
[Add photo filter]
Automatically beautify your photos with our new filter.
 
[Stricter requirements for profile photos]
Stricter req

【新配对交互】
我们提供了全新配对交互，操作体验更流畅，资料展示更直观。

【新增滤镜】
新增滤镜功能，自动美化你的照片。

【对头像要求更严格】
更加严格、明确的头像要求，提升Luxy社区质量，让你体验享受高端社交。

【BUG修复及性能优化】
提升图片加载速度。优化防诈骗机制

如果你遇到问题或需要帮助，可以在“设置”>“帮助与反馈”中联系我们。

[New Match Interface]
Brand new match card appearance. Check your crush’s profile easier.
[Add photo filter] Automatically beautify your photos with our new filter.

[Stricter requirements for profile photos] Stricter requirements for profile

【BUG修复及性能优化】
提升图片加载速度。优化防诈骗机制

如果你遇到问题或需要帮助，可以在“设置”>“帮助与反馈”中联系我们。

[Bug fixes and performance improvements]
Faster image loading Anti-scam mechanism

If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please go to Settings > FAQ & Feedback to leave your feedback and we will get back to you in the

[消息]
新增信息内的关键字搜索功能,现在你可以在消息页面的顶部进行搜索

[谁喜欢我]
优化谁喜欢我的列表的显示规则,提高您配对的效率

[修复问题及性能优化]
加载图片速度优化
用户质量保障.清理疑似诈骗,虚假,仿冒等用户信息

感谢您使用 Luxy 为了让您获得良好的用户体验,我们会在每次应用更新中不断优化速度及稳定性,您也可以在应用内的设置中心里找到“帮助与反馈”入口联系我们,我们会尽可能的帮助您

[Who likes me]
LuxyBLACK 用户可以在卡片上直接看到喜欢你的人,提高你的配对效率

[审核系统]
接入要求更高的审核系统,帮助处理诈骗及虚假账号
